Text: The producers can lower the price to $80 to raise demand back to 100 tickets, he explained. As a result of the reductions, the average price of a ticket to each part of the two-part play, which was about $154.44 last year, now is only about $78.45.
Cause: The producers can lower the price to $80 to raise demand back to 100 tickets, he explained.
Effect: As a result of the reductions, the average price of a ticket to each part of the two-part play, which was about $154.44 last year, now is only about $78.45.
Sentence: <e1>The producers can lower the price to $80 to raise demand back to 100 tickets, he explained.</e1> <e2>As a result of the reductions, the average price of a ticket to each part of the two-part play, which was about $154.44 last year, now is only about $78.45.</e2>
